News.headline: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Wealdstone
News.page_title: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Wealdstone
News.URL_keywords: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Wealdstone
News.short_description: A preview of the Daggers Emirates FA cup fourth qualifying round home fixture against Wealdstone on Saturday.
News.description:
The Daggers start their 2016/17 FA cup campaign at home to National League South side Wealdstone. The Daggers will hope to replicate their FA cup campaign from last season which saw them visit Premier League side Everton in the third round.
 
Wealdstone currently sit in 10th place in the National League South. The west London club made it to the first round of the FA cup last season but were knocked out by Colchester.
 
Previous 5 Results
 
Daggers
Eastleigh 0-1 Daggers
Torquay 1-0 Daggers
Daggers 0-0 Tranmere
Bromley 1-3 Daggers
Daggers 2-0 North Ferriby
 
Wealdstone
Chelmsford 4-1 Wealdstone
Wealdstone 2-1 Banbury (FA cup)
Wealdstone 1-2 Truro
Wealdstone 4-0 Histon (FA Cup)
Concord 0-1 Wealdstone
  
Team News
The Daggers will have captain Scott Doe back following his one match ban that was served in the game against Eastleigh. Andre Boucaud will also be available following his international duty which led to him missing the games against Torquay and Eastleigh
 
Previous Meetings
This is the first time that the two teams would have met in a competitive fixture. The Daggers travelled to Wealdstone in 2014 for a friendly. With the Stones winning 2-1.
 
FA Cup
There is a full fixture list of fourth round qualifying FA Cup matches on Saturday.

Tickets
Ticket information for Saturday's game can be found here
  
Social Media & Online
Follow the Daggers on Twitter for live updates throughout the match (@Dag_RedFC). There will also be updates on our Facebook page (OfficialDaggers). After the match there will be a match report on on the website.
